thread.title: Government Approves New Automotive Courses to Equip Students for Smart Mobility Jobs

author: Yukta Mudgal
title: Government Approves New Automotive Courses to Equip Students for Smart Mobility Jobs
text:
Government Approves New Automotive Courses to Equip Students for Smart Mobility Jobs
The new courses are designed to help students gain hands-on knowledge of modern vehicle systems, electric drivetrains, and connected technologies.
